AI Description: Knitr is an R package that enables integration of R code into LaTeX, Markdown, HTML, and other document formats. It allows for dynamic report generation, combining narrative text, code, and output.
Core Features:
1. Seamless integration of R code within various document formats.
2. Supports dynamic reporting with the ability to embed R code chunks.
3. Facilitates reproducible research by knitting together R code, output, and narrative in a single document.
4. Provides customizable formatting options and support for multiple output formats.
General Tags: R Package, Dynamic Reporting, Reproducible Research
